wikipedia_page.main: James Clark Bunten (28 March 1875 – 3 June 1935) was a Scottish sailor who competed for the Royal Clyde Yacht Club at the 1908 Summer Olympics.He was a crew member of the Scottish boat Hera, which won the gold medal in the 12 metre class. He was born and died in Glasgow.
